website_summaries.verdict: A quality instrument that's appropriate for ambitious beginners and intermediate-level players.
pros: Yellow brass body construction with lacquer finish, power forged keys, a strong bell brace, tapered pivot keys
Comes with contoured carrying case, one Rico reed, cork grease, gloves, cleaning cloth, swabs, and mouthpiece
cons: You may wish to replace the standard mouthpiece and ligature

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional sax player. I purchased this sax to play when I travel so I don't have to take my very expensive yamaha with me. I am impress with the quality of this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: rgsaxofon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Instrument For Budget Minded Players
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new saxophone! I haven't heard a single complaint from him about it. He is in his 4th year of band (Sophomore). The only thing that could improve is the swab to have a line attached to pull through the horn. It has a nice finish and lots of engraving on the bell area. He seems to be able to play it smoothly. We did switch out the mouthpiece and ligature from his old horn to this one, as they were better quality than the one that came with this horn.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Chenault

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the way it sounded Despite playing the saxophone ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an international customer and I recently got interested in playing the saxophone and wanted to buy one that I could start off with that was affordable and long-lasting. I just got my saxophone delivered to me within five days since I've placed my order. I'm pleased with the way it sounded Despite playing the saxophone for the first time I was able to do so with ease, with the aid of the included booklet. The customer service is really reliable too.
customer_reviews.author: M Angel

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Saw a positive YouTube review on this horn. I wanted something to spare my aging Mark VI some daily wear and tear and decided to try it. I was really surprised by the quality of the build - really tight. Second surprise - how well it played. From low Bb to altissimo very responsive with good sound. I would have been really excited to have a horn this good as a beginner. It would be a superior student instrument as well as a great reliable back up horn.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gordley

customer_reviews.title: Great Sax for the money and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at several options I decided to buy this saxophone in June 2019. It is a great saxophone for a beginner like me and it is a great value for the money. It comes with a transportation case and all accessories you need to play. Overall the quality is great and I am very pleased with the sounds I get. I am using Rico plasticover reeds and the sound is great. I recommend to buy a cleaning kit to keep that sax in a great shape. Jean Paul USA has a great customer service. I contacted them for a question and I had an answer within 24 hours. Happy Camper!
customer_reviews.author: cbduser

customer_reviews.title: Its great, save one of the keys is stuck and no one from tech support calls back
customer_reviews.text: We have put this in the shop because of the flaw, then we had to take it back again because fixing this made something else not work. My son called and left messages, no one called back. I finally made a call and actually got someone on the phone, he said he would pass the message along. No one called back. I called again and left a message. No one called back. I am glad it works for everyone else. It did not work for us. God forbid you need help.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Easily as good as a Yamaha intermediate horn that costs much, much more.
customer_reviews.text: Horn came in from a warehouse deal in good shape. Easily as good as a Yamaha intermediate horn that costs much, much more. Rods were in good shape, corks in good shape, intonation is ok, playability is good, springs and pads are good. Neck was fine. Mouthpiece is the weakest part. Can replace with a yamaha for 25 or a good Selmer C*. Case is nice too. Really this was a steal for $320.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R

customer_reviews.title: Very decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I played alto through grade school to high school graduation (1989) but put it down until buying this Jean Paul from Amazon a year ago. I’m not a professional but this horn seems to be as solid as the Bundy II I had in high school. I have called Jean Paul a couple of times with questions and received good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA MURPHY

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter who has a sax on rent and she hated it. So we are still renting the one ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter who has a sax on rent and she hated it. So we are still renting the one she has through a local music store.
customer_reviews.author: Earthroma Llc

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT Customer Service at Jean Paul!
customer_reviews.text: I got this saxophone just this week from amazon and was super excited, but soon realized that I had a few cleaning supplies missing. I went on the Jean Paul website to email their support to see about getting those things. They were very quick to reply to me and make sure I got what I needed! Just wanted to let everyone know that besides a great deal for a great saxophone, if you ever have any troubles, go through the Jean Paul website and they’ll fix you right up! They are very nice and very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: J Simental

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not played the sax since my freshmen high school year. i have recently got inspired to pick it up again after hearing Masego and many different artists. i did not want to spend too much money because i did not know if i would commit or not, after reading the reviews i decided to buy it and i love it. i have playing everyday now trying to get better. i was missing a body swap (no big deal) reached out to jean paul and they responded sending me a body swap. amazing instrument for the price, amazing quality and customer support.
customer_reviews.author: lastpharaoh

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son started playing saxophone in his school band last year. So I bought Jean Paul AS-400 Student Alto Saxophone for him. Now more than a year past and the saxophone still performs well. My son loves it. Of course, there is better one in the market but cost a lot more. For beginner, this is a solid one. You can't go wrong with it. P.S. Jean Paul's customer service is very helpful. When I first get the saxophone, some accessories were missing. But once I contact Jean Paul, they sent the missing items promptly. They even included extra cleaning cloth :)
customer_reviews.author: Tak Leung

customer_reviews.title: I used to own a Yamaha YAS 270 and this one is the same!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Yamaha YAS 270, and the tone quality on that thing is amazing. I just bought this one to start the new school year, and I don’t even feel a difference between the 2! The tone is rich and warm, and I can play notes with ease. The only thing I recommend is getting some reeds and a care kit, as the saxophone only comes with 1 reed and a micro fiber cloth. I would like to get a silver one, but it is expensive. Overall this is a great instrument, I would give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginner/intermediate player
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this saxophone about a week ago. As the description specifies, it comes with a sturdy case, strap, mouthpiece, and a 2.5 reed. Since I am a beginner, I ordered 2.0 reeds to easy my learning. It sounds great out of the box. So far, I have no complaints. After registering the saxophone, customer service mentioned they have a service center close to where I live. Customer service seems to be proactive and take clients seriously. I highly recommend this sax if you are a beginner/intermediate.
customer_reviews.author: MeloBicchi

customer_reviews.title: excelent sax and moderate price
customer_reviews.text: listo para tocar salsa con mi saxo.I was skeptical at firts because of the price,excelent sax and moderate price..Just received my new Jean Paul sax as 400 sp Iam so pleased.Ialways wanted to play sax,now my dreams come true.All registers are clear,vibrant and responsive,in the higher and lowers registers.This instrument has a solid craftmanship,it has beatiful engraving inside and outside,of the belt well made,the horn is very lovely,it has good intonation,the ligature is an excelent Rico H ligature the mouthpiece is a esprit Bari.I love that they also provide a 1 year warranty,the suit case/backpack is excelente.I recommend them to all those who want play saxopphone especially the brave lovers salsa.Azuuuuuuuuucarrrrrr
customer_reviews.author: fernando delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Our son decided to take up saxaphone at the last minute this school year and we were faced with the choice to rent or buy. After checking out rentals that were $45-$55/mo we started shopping around. We did our best to review the different options out there. This saxaphone was rated as one of the best. It was ready to go right out of the box. The sound is great and it is well put together. My son loves it, as much as he did the Yamaha he played in 6th grade. He is now a sophomore in high school. I would highly recommend this, especially for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase. Very nice seller. I rented it until owning it and I am so happy. I paid under 25 dollars per month for less than a year and today it is all mine! Yaay, me. It's a great sounding saxophone and I highly recommend you buy from these guys. I love to hear the saxophone while sniffing beautiful feet. Thank you so much for taking my money.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric Feetjose

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this alto sax in May. I had ~10 years exprerience playing saxophone but stoppped during college, so bought this to get back to the music. It was a happy purchase for the first month, aka while the return window was open. After that, things just fell apart. Random corks started missing due to quality of the glues they used, and some keypads become loose and didnt seal well. Tunes and sound quality were defitnily affected. Not a purchase I would recommend to anyone who plan to seriously own the instrument. Now due to corona virus, repairing is another pain.
customer_reviews.author: Yubo

customer_reviews.title: Great Support!
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding saxophone. A much better deal than getting one locally. One frustrating thing though is that a lot of local shops won’t repair it unless they sell it. Thankfully, Jean Paul’s support is very helpful. They will send out parts and help with problems immediately. I’m glad we got this sax.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Amazing Sax!!
customer_reviews.text: I rented a more expensive sax for my son to use in his 6th grade band class... he never played an instrument before. I thought he sounded good for a beginner! THEN I purchased a Jean Paul Alto Sax and WHAT A DIFFERENCE!! The airy spit sound went away and all I hear now are rich, beautiful notes! Wonderful tone! Solid well-built instrument! GREAT backpack case with a zipper compartment for his music. He's very organized now! VERY SATISFIED CUSTOMER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Staskowski

customer_reviews.title: JeanPaulUSA warranty service is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this instrument from JeanPaulUSA nearly an year ago, it was good for the price and my son loved it. Recently that few keys are loose and he broke the sax-neck, i contacted them for repair of those loose keys and its just one month about to expire the manufacture warranty, but they were happy to assist me in repair at free of cost. Also Enrique from JeanPaul gave me a discounted price on sax-neck and free sax case, kudos to their awesome service.
customer_reviews.author: Rajeshram

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and Sound.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses the Sax for beginning band. I was very hesitant about purchasing this instrument thinking that it would be a cheep knock off and wouldn't hold up to the quality required for band. we have had the instrument now for a few months and it is awesome. I showed it her teacher before making the final decision to keep it or return it and he was quite impressed with the instrument, he had never heard to Jean Paul instruments before. Well worth the money considering I was in a rent to own instrument which would have cost me over $1100. for a used instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful AS-409S Alto Saxaohone from Jean Paul!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect order, rich tonal quality, particularly in the lower registers, key action very responsive, and a nice solid weight! Thank you Jean Paul for this wonderful instrument!
customer_reviews.author: Paula V. Durnian

customer_reviews.title: These guys stand behind their instruments!
customer_reviews.text: Had to send m son's sax in for repair; likely my son's fault (6th grader). Not only were these guys responsive (2 day turnaround on repair) they were great to work with...Highly recommend Jean Paul for your middle school or high school band instrument needs.
customer_reviews.author: Klrsmile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Instrument for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This saxophone is the first saxophone that I have purchased for myself. I was at first skeptical because of how low the price was, but after playing it for a couple days, I can confidently say that this is the best saxophone you can buy for the price that it is sold. The instrument feels and sounds like a professional instrument that would potentially cost up to four figures, and has left me with no complaints. Prior to purchasing, the customer support was quick to responding to any questions that I had, a service unmatched by any other customer support that I have ever experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica J.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So thankful for all of the reviews! It helped me make my decision on buying this saxophone. It is a great quality saxophone for the price. My daughter is in middle school it I am sure it will be a good enough sax to last her through high school. The cost of renting one is more expensive than purchasing and you still have a used horn at the end of the day. Plus Amazon let’s you pay for the saxophone in installments!! No brainer.
customer_reviews.author: THayes

customer_reviews.title: great sax
customer_reviews.text: my kid started to play Sax and was renting one from a store for the first few months. did tones of research and found this sax. it's half the price of yamaha and it sound great. great quality and her teacher gives it a thumbs up. i think it actually sounds better then the yamaha that cost twice as much. great buy.
customer_reviews.author: never again shop retail

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter couldn’t be happier with this sax and I was delighted by the sticker price. My 6th grader decided she wanted to learn saxophone in addition to the trumpet. Given how ripped off I feel still paying in stallments for her student trumpet... I was more satisfied simply buying this sax -paid in full- and didn’t sacrifice quality. The case and extra goodies are amazing. I also bought additional reeds as advised. She loves her sax and is on her way to jazz band.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Amani

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Tone quality is awesome. My son finds the keys easy to reach and use. It holds its tone quality easily. The only thing we needed with this kit was a better neck strap and a good cleaning kit. If you child is not that big, this case can be a little overwhelming. We did get a more compact case.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Sadly the horn looks and sounds nice but the tuning is off
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the horn looks and sounds nice but the tuning is off. The jump between C# and D in the middle to upper register is almost a whole step, meaning the whole upper octave is off a half step from the lower octave on every note. This is unacceptable for a new horn. Returned it. (Been playing 30 years, just looking for a horn for my son.)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Habicht

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing for 30 years, I currently play a Selmer Paris Tenor, Bought this Alto for my Daughter and this saxophone plays as well as my Selmer, the quality is amazing for the price and the best part is their customer service. Octave key broke, I spoke to Enrique and he was extremely helpful and is sending a replacement at no charge. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Leon

customer_reviews.title: Tentative but other reviews swayed me - glad I took the chance.
customer_reviews.text: Buying anything sight unseen is always risky, but decided to take a chance. I bought this for my son, 9 yrs old, beginning band student. The horn seems to be well made, extremely playable. I suggest an upgraded mouthpiece (Yamaha 4c is very affordable). I've played the sax for over 40 years. I feel this horn is comparable to a Yamaha YAS-23 but for about 1/2 the cost. Only time will tell if it is as durable. However, after registering the horn, you will get a one year parts and labor warranty.
customer_reviews.author: DWG

customer_reviews.title: Factory defect :(
customer_reviews.text: I would gave the saxophone 5/5 but I had to put 3 stars ,The saxophone sounds amazing for now, it has a chip in one of the Tone hole and it’s going give me future headaches when pads stiffen a little, I know it might look like nothing but is really crucial that all these holes are airtight.
customer_reviews.author: Gama

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sax, very best for the price
customer_reviews.text: As a student sax or a backup sax you can't go wrong with this one. It was an emergency purchase for me, as my pro sax was lost on a flight . I now have my pro sax back but this Jean Paul sax filled the void and no one could tell the difference.Thanks Jean Paul.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: No brainer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10 year old, after seeing the rental fees at local shops. A gentleman suggested this to try out, and if not you can return! Totally worth it and the case is great and easier to carry for my kiddo walking home from school
customer_reviews.author: S. Ewy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and has held up for a kid in band.
customer_reviews.text: We looked at a lot of saxophones to buy as well as rent for my son in 6th grade band. The case and sax are well made. For the money, in comparison to other options, this was the best value. And I can tell this instrument and case will last a lifetime. I cannot professionally review the sax, but as a parent who has played multiple instruments and paid out of pocket for something new and different, I am pleased. We did buy thinner reeds for my son to learn with (obviously not the fault of the saxophone).
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: So far the alto saxophone is serving my son well ...
customer_reviews.text: So far the alto saxophone is serving my son well, I bought it in his 5th grade and he will be going to his 6th grade with it, as I’m reviewing he is playing it at home
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great sound great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound great quality. Lightweight but not flimsy. Would give 5 stars however the day after it arrived a piece of the foam and what I am guessing is felt broke off inside the case. Upon inspection a week later and the zipper to where the backpack style straps is starting to fray. This hasn't not even been transported to school yet. So 4 stars for the saxophone and hopefully we can find a better quality case to protect our investment. Changed to 5 stars after the superb customer service received for the case. Truly can't ask for a better saxophone amazing quality and worth every $$$$
customer_reviews.author: maybelline

customer_reviews.title: Great sax!
customer_reviews.text: This sax is awesome. Sounds good and looks great. If you can afford it, I would recommend this over a used (named brand) model. To see a good review of this sax check out BetterSax on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: michael montoya

customer_reviews.title: and am really happy with its performance thus far
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this saxophone, and am really happy with its performance thus far! I love the fact that it's a "new" purchase, as opposed to me always buying used. The horn is very well constructed, solid, and the sound quality is amazing!! A definite recommendation here, as I have no complaints about my choice to go with Jean-Paul instruments!
customer_reviews.author: Bugball31

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner sax
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased so far with this saxophone. Great tone and sound! The warranty is a great feature as well! Very easy to register.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Great saxophone ....very nice sound it doesn't really feel like a student sax ....very lightweight and comfortable ....the case that comes with it is the best I've seen so far on any sax ...practical ..I've had this sax for 6 months and play it everyday
customer_reviews.author: jose chavolla

customer_reviews.title: Good sax for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sax. I’d played when I was younger but haven’t for probably 20 years or more but wanted to get back into it without spending a lot of money. I’d done my research and this one seemed like a good choice, and I’m glad I chose it. The sound is good, it’s easy to play, it comes with everything you need, and customer support has been great. It was missing a cleaning swab when it arrived but I contacted customer service and heard back almost immediately which was great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Key Guard
customer_reviews.text: Will update review when/if issue is corrected, Damaged Key Guard on the bottom, separated from main body. Not a happy camper, kind of vibrates when playing the lower notes.
customer_reviews.author: leilee

customer_reviews.title: We have been very happy with the quality of our Jean Paul AS-400 which ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been very happy with the quality of our Jean Paul AS-400 which we purchased for our 11 year old son. His band instructor has been impressed with the quality of the sound. It has a soft jazzy tone. Within a couple of months of our purchase, my son dropped his instrument while still under the one year manufacturer warranty and Jean Paul was very helpful and cooperative in assisting us with sending it in for repair and returning it in optimal condition. They gave us very personal attention, which we appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Jean Paul- AMAZING Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Jean Paul has AMAZING customer service!!! Call them not Amazon with any issues! They answered very quickly- a real person even! I sent the email and problem was fixed! (We had a small issue with the ligature, and they replaced it!) Also- The saxophone is beautiful! Update- their ended up being nothing wrong with the ligature after all! The screws on the ligature were just on the wrong side so it wasn’t threading. But seriously great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amy K.

customer_reviews.title: excellent saxophone
customer_reviews.text: Band teacher was happy with it. Very nice looking, daughter says it is the best looking sax in her band. Has great Sound no leaks. Nice case that can be used like a backpack, and protects the saxophone well, still light weight. Saxophone is built to last. Did not come with white gloves. Did not want them, all cheap Chinese saxophones come with them. You will need a cleaning kit. Get more Rico reeds. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jones

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My son loves it. It’s super shiney and gold. My son’s music teacher said that it was a great purchase. Looks beautiful and sounds awesome.
customer_reviews.author: sheleka massey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Looks nice and and the sound is great, no difference in sound than the expensive brands. Recently, I contact Jean Paul costumer service, they offer outstanding costumer service. I would highly recommend to buy that saxophone, you wouldn't regret.
customer_reviews.author: V.A.

customer_reviews.title: durable saxophone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this saxophone for my husband. It comes with a very good case and swab (and these items work very well). The saxophone itself is good. It sounds ok, though the intonation is just slightly flat on the C2. the pads and springs still work well after 1 year of constant use. He has had many hours of enjoyment on this, Im glad I got it for him. He says he is looking forward to getting the Jean Paul Professional Mouthpiece AS-4, and see how great it will sound.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Choi

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on Jay Metcalf's recommendation and I'm very pleased with it. Built well, sounds great, and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Motownrick

customer_reviews.title: So far having a blast practicing
customer_reviews.text: First sax. Love it. Comes with everything you need to get started. Although I bought a few accessories. Not sure if the extra cost for the gold-plated was worth it or not. From the pictures they look the same. Regardless, I'm very pleased with it. The buttons look like they're an epoxy with a mother-of-pearl design. Pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ciotti

customer_reviews.title: Value value value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful well made instrument. Amazing quality at this price. Best one out there for under $500. Case is great as well. Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.author: William L Bray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A piece of art, Extremely well made-I gave one to a nephew and kept the other-
customer_reviews.author: RADOG

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and company follow-up
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 13-year-old to start to learn the saxophone. She loves it and has played it most every day. The sound quality is beautiful, and it's such a pleasure to hear her jazzy tunes echoing through the house. She has been learning herself and has found it very easy to pick up. (Lessons in her future to help even more.) I also want to say that the company, Jean Paul USA, has been very helpful and friendly. I like the fact that it's made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: KJDiamond

customer_reviews.title: I heard him play and the tone is excellent. This is a great buy for a primary ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he loves it. His teachers are impressed with the quality. I heard him play and the tone is excellent. This is a great buy for a primary school student. Maybe even High School.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Cheap decent sax
customer_reviews.text: Good beginners sax. I’ll definitely upgrade when my daughter gets better. But it’ll last her a good few years.
customer_reviews.author: Herman W.

customer_reviews.title: It plays much better than woodwind and sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Until last year I rented woodwind branded and this year bought this for my son 7th grader and he loves this instrument and feels it's far better than rented version. He enjoys playing this and strongly recommend. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jai Hind

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted to play the saxophone
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to play a saxophone and this was a great way of playing one by renting it through the service.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXANDER ZUCKERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great saxophone for a high school student. My son is in the marching band in high school. When he practice at home the saxophone has great sound. I am very pleased with this saxophone and so is my son.
customer_reviews.author: ER_RN

customer_reviews.title: glad to not be paying $10 a week for a used rental.
customer_reviews.text: packed perfect, looks great. sounds good, my kid is happy. I am also glad to not be paying $10 a week for a used rental.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is very happy with the instrument. Delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Instrument and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have received my Saxophone and I am really pleased with it. As a beginner who is trying to look for a decent Saxophone under a tight budget, I was apprehensive on buying this as I was afraid that the quality won't be as good due to the price. I am glad to say that upon receiving the Saxophone, it exceeded my expectations and it looked really beautiful too. The customer service is also really helpful and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: CosmoBytes

customer_reviews.title: Great instrument for beginner
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my 8-year-old son that had never played saxophone before. He's been playing for the last few months and he absolutely loves it. His teachers have commented that the instrument is really high quality. Highly recommend instrument and company.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays the clarinet and her music teacher asked her to pick up the Sax. Well, there were cheap and high priced instruments on Amazon. This one is something in between. Built very well and the case is high quality. Great product for the money. Recommend to anyone looking for an intermediate quality instrument.
customer_reviews.author: William Bunker

customer_reviews.title: It's great for school band student and I had good experience with their customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Fair price for the instrument. I son use it three times a week for his band practice. We did have one pad leaking problem after using it for 5 months, but their customer support is great. After communicating with James Zenderman, an support agent, the vendor paid for the fix with no problem. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: yuzhang

customer_reviews.title: Case is Junk
customer_reviews.text: Although we have been happy with the saxophone. The case it came in is junk. The back straps ripped out in the first week then a few weeks in the main handle ripped out. I put a strap on the end clips and a couple months in both of those have ripped out. It now has NO HANDLES to carry it by.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a broken part.
customer_reviews.text: Hadn’t have the chance to play it. Unfortunately it arrived with a broken part (neck attachment pin broken) and I had to return it because I was leaving US the next day, without enough time for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Frederico Carvalho Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Quality is hit or miss.
customer_reviews.text: Low B/Bb would not seal. Not free flowing. The only thing positive is the horn sounded amazing the notes I could get. Easy and free return process.
customer_reviews.author: Name withheld to protect the innocent

customer_reviews.title: Amazing inexpensive sax
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purchase for the money. I got a discounted version from amazon warehouse and it came in perfect condition. The sax plays easily, and in tune, with a rather good tone as well. There are better, more pro, saxes out there, but for the money, this instrument is simply fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great choice. No problems with this instrument. Our son is fairly new to band and this saxophone is a great starter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plays and looks great
customer_reviews.text: First of all it comes in a very nice case.The horn and the sound are incredible. I'm not a pro but I've tried several new pro horns and this can compete with much more expensive saxophones. I have the tenor as well this silver is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: David Parks

customer_reviews.title: good saxophone for student
customer_reviews.text: the keys works good and the sound of the horn is good for new students. it arrived in two days after order from amazon. The carry case is very strong and provides a good protection for the sax.
customer_reviews.author: manuel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at a good price point.
customer_reviews.text: Not a professional player but I really like this sax, it has a nice tone, keys function perfectly, fit and finish are well executed. A great value for the money. Nice case included also, for students and anyone that travels with their instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great sax for great price.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and excellent service. Sax plaus beautiful and great price for everything you get.
customer_reviews.author: Ranee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument and perfect for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who just started beginning middle school band and he loves it! Plays and sounds great and also excellent customer service when we needed help!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good for your money
customer_reviews.text: Band teacher said the tone of this sax is pretty good -. So it's good enough for our fifth grader. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: oohme!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a student and someone who would like to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a student and someone who would like to learn how to play. My son loves it and is getting better every day. Durable and sounds good. Im glad I purchased from Jean Paul USA.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saxophone
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I am a beginner wanting to learn to play. I was very impressed with customer service support I received.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt W Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sax for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a 5th grader and just started playing the alto sax. We purchased this sax and she was so excited when she received it. My husband has been playing saxophone for years and he loves the quality of the sax!! It has a good sound and the price was right. We would totally recommend this sax for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Rose T

customer_reviews.title: The silver alto saxophone is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the opportunity to try this saxophone because inside the neck was pitted with corrosion. Hopefully this will be replaced and the alto sax will perform beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Baker

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Well made alto sax for beginners or intermediate players. Great tone somewhat dark and not too bright. Excellent customer service at Jean Paul. I think this horn is a best buy for a quality sax. Comes with a good warranty.
customer_reviews.author: K. Breaux

customer_reviews.title: Mine came broken.
customer_reviews.text: I noticed when I try to play any notes involving the G and the octave key the lifter wont lift. you're better off buying an instrument at a store rather than one online
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pan

customer_reviews.title: Too cheaply made to be worth it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these saxes and they were both defective. The tone holes are cheaply made where there was actually a chip in one of them. Both came with corks that didn't fit the mouthpiece that came with the sax and one had a major leak in the soldering area of the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My 5th grader's new sax arrived in perfect condition. I'd done some research online and had several questions so I called Jean Paul in FL and they were very helpful and explained to me about the different models. I used to play sax so while he is just learning, so far I am very happy with this sax in regards to quality and sound.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna

customer_reviews.title: Alto saxophone
customer_reviews.text: Great intermediate instrument for my 6th grader. Band teachers were impressed. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MARCO A MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me and I am truly beginning L. Sounds beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I contacted Enrique from Jean Paul USA and he was amazing and was extremely helpful by sending me a loaner ...
customer_reviews.text: My saxophone was not functioning properly after only 7 months of use. I contacted Enrique from Jean Paul USA and he was amazing and was extremely helpful by sending me a loaner saxophone while my saxophone was being repaired. The customer service he provided was impeccable. Stay tuned for my repair review.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice instrument and case
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this for my 2nd year saxophone player in elementary school. Very nice instrument and case. Arrived promptly. Will update once he will have some playing time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, nice fit and finish. My daughter and her music teacher were quite impressed. We had a problem with a valve leaking after a year and Jean Paul repaired at no charge and with no hassle. We are definitely happy with this instrument. Thanks for all your help Josh
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for a student
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just started playing the sax and he is like, totally loving this instrument. It is not heavy and the keys are easy to press. I am glad we purchased this particular color and brand.
customer_reviews.author: Browne Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great saxophone!
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I purchased this sax for my 14 year old son in November. It came as promised, on-time and is beautiful! My son loves it. This is a very professional company with top notch customer service. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: M. Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Great sax for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and bought this based on good review on youtube. This sax lives up to expectation. Sounds and plays great. Great value for money. Great customer ser. Had a problem with mpc.- table not flat but they took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Indelicato

customer_reviews.title: List of accessories is not heipful.
customer_reviews.text: This came with a cloth but no string. You will need to order an alto Schwab. It did not list neck strap, but it came with a basic one.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mase

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a lot of time with it yet, but initial quality is excellent. Great value thus far. I did have to call customer service and they responded with a real person and a real solution. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 3gunner

customer_reviews.title: Great tone to this sax
customer_reviews.text: Great tone to this sax. Is an exceptional value for the quality of the instrument. Recommend to anyone looking for a beginner saxophone.
customer_reviews.author: cougblue

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this saxophone! It looks lovely, sounds amazing! I bought for my 14 year old since his old sax wore out. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: bluejade

customer_reviews.title: Great Saxophone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful saxophone. Durable yet very attractive. Most importantly it sounds fabulous! Beginner or intermediate you will be satisfied with the Jean Paul AS-400.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Great quality And value
customer_reviews.text: Keys work well good response Good toneUnless beginner get better mouthpiece
customer_reviews.author: William J Bixby

customer_reviews.title: I like this saxophone
customer_reviews.text: I like this saxophone! Very good sound from low to high! High quality instrument. Beautiful! Good for beginners and professionals. I recommend this saxophone for all.
customer_reviews.author: Arslan Khaydarov

product_meta.title: Jean Paul USA AS-400 Student Alto Saxophone
product_meta.description: Configuration:Brass| Style:Saxophone onlyThe Jean Paul AS-400 alto saxophone is the perfect sax for beginning and intermediate music students. It offers a superior tone in its class, with even key action and placement that feels just right for Band members. Its fluid key work gives it a relaxed feeling for any saxophonist, while its well-rounded intonation and warm sound make it a welcome instrument in any band. The Jean Paul alto sax features beautiful Yellow brass body construction, power forged keys, a strong bell Brace for durability, and tapered pivot keys for ease of use. You'll appreciate the value of the jean Paul AS-400 alto saxophone just as much as its sound! Jean Paul has designed the perfect saxophone that is easy to play, Durable, made affordable for All beginning and intermediate musicians.
feature_bullets: The Jean Paul Alto Saxophone is in key of Eb
Beautiful yellow brass body construction with Lacquer finish
Included Accessories: 1 Rico Reed, Carrying Case, Cork grease, Gloves ,Cleaning Cloth, Swabs, and Mouthpiece
Comes with robust contoured carrying case for easy transportation.Mouthpiece cap: nickel-plated Resonators: nylon

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars434 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
